definition: شريف šarif pl شرفاء šurafa اشراف ašrāf distinguished, eminent, illustrious, noble, highborn, high-bred; honored, celebrated; sublime, exalted, august; honorable, respectable, honest (trade, pro feysion); sherif, title of the descendants of Mohammed; الشريف in Ottoman times, title of the Governor of Mecca; الشرفاء honorable and upright people
